programme.sub-title: Toronto Maple Leafs at Vegas Golden Knights

programme.title: NHL Hockey Washington Capitals at New York Rangers
programme.sub-title: Washington Capitals at New York Rangers
programme.desc: The Capitals travel to face the Rangers. Washington outscored New York 12-7 in taking the first two meetings of 2024-25. Caps legend Alex Ovechkin, who continues his pursuit of Wayne Gretzky's all-time goals record, scored three in those games.
